briefTitle: PRecision Interventions for SMoking in the SCCS

armGroups.label: Respiragene (PC-Respiragene)
interventionNames: Genetic: Genetically-informed lung cancer risk score

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Daily smoker of ≥5 cigarettes per day (CPD)
* Enrolled participant of the Southern Community Cohort Study (SCCS) who completed a prior survey indicating they were willing to be contacted regarding a smoking cessation clinical trial
* Residence in Tennessee (TN) or Mississippi (MS)
* Has stored blood sample with the SCCS
* Has established primary care provider (PCP)
* Medically eligible and willing to take varenicline and NRT

Exclusion Criteria:

* Currently taking medication to quit smoking
* enrolled, or planning to be enrolled, in another smoking cessation program
* Inability to give informed consent or participate due to cognitive disorder (e.g., dementia, severe intellectual disability)
* Unstable psychiatric illness (ER or hospitalized for psychiatric condition in past 6 months, change in psychiatric medications in past 3 months, or suicidal ideation in past 6 months)
* not able to send or receive mail
* no access to a telephone or inability to communicate by telephone
* unable to speak and read English
* history of seizures or Buerger's disease
* currently pregnant or breastfeeding

outcomeMeasures.title: Intervention Feasibility: Ability to Retain Participants
outcomeMeasures.description: Feasibility of delivering precision care (PC) interventions in the Southern Community Cohort Study (SCCS), as evidenced by ability to recruit, engage, and retain participants through end of the study.

outcomeMeasures.title: Cessation History - Quit Attempts
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants who reported making a quit attempt during the trial, as defined by use of a quit aid or reporting "not at all" for current smoking at any timepoint

outcomeMeasures.title: Cessation History - Medication Use
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants who received, and those who subsequently used, a smoking cessation medication during the trial

outcomeMeasures.title: Cessation History - Quitline
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants who reported using the quitline ("phone support") at any point during the trial

outcomeMeasures.title: Cessation History - Self-reported Abstinence
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants who self-reported abstinence at the 6 month survey

outcomeMeasures.title: Cessation History - Validated Abstinence
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants who completed a salivary cotinine sample; participants who biochemically-verified as abstinent (salivary cotinine ≤10ng/ml)
